bio: Empowering DAOs with data-driven insights | Bridging goals and informed decisions üö©üåê
contributionDescription: The ‚ÄúOP Governance Analytics Dashboard‚Äù team has worked to democratize information within the Optimism Collective by developing a comprehensive DAO Governance Analytics Dashboard. Our contribution focused on amplifying governance accessibility by providing a user-friendly platform that distills complex governance metrics, such as participation, voter behavior, and power structures, into understandable insights. We also open-source our dashboard website repository for the community to use. Our mission is to foster informed participation, nurturing an inclusive decision-making environment, and reinforcing the effectiveness of the governance process.

contributionLinks.description: Open-source repository for the Curia Governance Dashboard website

impactDescription: Empowering and impacting the Optimism Collective, our OP Dashboard has elevated governance through transparent, data-driven strategies. By refining features and democratizing essential metrics (Participation, Voting Power, and more), we've enriched stakeholder engagement and decision-making, catalyzing a culture of accountable and astute governance across the collective.

fundingSources.description: We received the highest vote for Season 4, Intent 4 Mission.

pwCategorySuggestions: Governance & Tokens, Blockchain Infrastructure, Community Building
